title: Monero Payment Proofs & View Keys for Audits (Without Oversharing)
quickSteps: Start by naming the exact question you must answer: prove a specific payment, show income for a period, or prove reserves at a point in time.
For one-off disputes, use a Monero payment/transaction proof instead of sharing wallet history or any view-only access.
If someone needs ongoing oversight, use a dedicated reporting wallet and share view-only access only for that wallet and only for the needed time window.
Package your evidence so it’s easy to verify: invoice reference, recipient address/subaddress, dates, the proof string, and short copy-paste instructions.
Shrink the blast radius: keep business and personal wallets separate, never share spend keys, and avoid screenshots that reveal unrelated transactions.
